backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining a habit tracker backend with CRUD operations for habits, check-in functionality, and query methods to retrieve habits sorted by name or check-in count.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a completed feature to update the background color of a specific element in HabitsPage.tsx to light blue using Tailwind CSS.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing a React habit tracker app with professional typography, clean design system, and comprehensive habit tracking features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space with muted tones and professional design tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Habit Tracker application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router with routes for the habits page (/) and summary page (/summary), wrapped in a Layout component.
frontend/src/components/CheckInButton.ts: Button component for checking in to a habit, displaying a checkmark icon and 'Done' state when already checked in, with loading state during mutation.
frontend/src/components/HabitCard.tsx: Card component displaying a single habit with title, description, check-in button, and streak display, with hover shadow effects.
frontend/src/components/HabitForm.tsx: Form component for creating new habits with name and optional description fields, using controlled inputs and mutation hook for submission.
frontend/src/components/HabitList.tsx: Component rendering a responsive grid of HabitCard components with loading spinner and empty state messaging when no habits exist.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component with sticky header containing logo and navigation links, main content outlet, and footer with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/StreakDisplay.ts: Component displaying current and longest streak statistics with badge icon and amber-themed styling, calculated from check-in timestamps.
frontend/src/components/WeeklySummary.ts: Displays a weekly summary dashboard with overall stats (total check-ins, completion rate, active habits) and per-habit breakdown using cards and progress bars. Fetches habits data and calculates weekly metrics using the useWeeklySummary hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state. Invalidates and refetches dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout functionality. Creates and manages AuthClient with configurable options and exposes authentication state (identity, login status, errors) to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for habit-related operations: useGetHabits fetches all habits, useAddHabit creates new habits, and useCheckIn records check-ins. All mutations invalidate the habits query cache on success.
Calculates current and longest streaks from an array of check-in timestamps by converting nanoseconds to dates, removing duplicates, and counting consecutive days.
frontend/src/hooks/useTodayCheckIn.ts: Determines if a habit has been checked in today by comparing the last check-in timestamp (converted from nanoseconds) against today's date range.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeeklySummary.ts: Computes weekly summary statistics from habits data including total check-ins, completion rate, and per-habit breakdown by filtering check-ins from the last 7 days and counting unique days.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes using OKLCH color space, and utility classes for gradients, shadows, and text effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component into the root DOM element.
frontend/src/pages/HabitsPage.tsx: Renders the main habits page with a header, HabitForm for adding new habits, and HabitList for displaying existing habits.
frontend/src/pages/SummaryPage.tsx: Renders the weekly summary page with a header and the WeeklySummary component showing progress statistics.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme extensions including OKLCH-based color system, typography settings, border radius variables, shadows, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Project state file for a habit tracker application with light blue background. Contains one existing feature that updates a specific element's background color to light blue using Tailwind CSS.
